game_description: In this game you play as a monke and run around the maps! You can also drip your monke with cosmetics, but don't forget, this is coming out of your paycheck. There's lots of nice of nice mods but don't mess up because they have a special item with them! Enjoy being monkey because you are a monke stupid! Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/G8c9t8t9
review_1: so i went into horror mode and i decided to play something else, i press the oculus button and a loud poof sound went from my oculus and it turned off, i had 78% when the game first launched so no my oculus didnt run out of battery, when i try to turn it on it wont! delete this game rn
review_2: So people are talking about how Monke Chasers are bad,I’m here to sort this out. .The IP Reviews People are saying this game has your IP. Yes it does,but,we have it for a good cause. Gorilla tag,Capuchin,Penguin Paradise,our game AND ALL Fan games of gtag have your IP’s incase you need to be IP banned.How do you think Lemming IP bans people? .Moderators I’m a moderator myself(doesn’t have vent access yet) and people are saying they aren’t doing their job. We ARE.just because you accidentally got kicked by them or did on purpose doesn’t mean they aren’t doing their job. You would’ve got kicked for a specific reason,and this game is supposed to be welcome for everyone 13+.If you are under 13 you NEED to be banned.
